description: This file defines an asynchronous Python script that creates and runs an agent to search for Airbnb listings using MCP and Gemini models, with functions for setting up the agent, executing the search, and printing the response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified models and tools.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class representing the Gemini 2.5 Pro model used for generating responses.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A tool class for interfacing with MCP server for Airbnb listings.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that creates an MCPTools instance, sets up an agent with Gemini model, and executes a search for Airbnb listings based on the input message.
